title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1157.10 - Fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1157.10 - Fees

State Regulations
(a) The authority
may charge a fee to an applicant for the preparation and/or review of an
environmental impact statement. The fee charged shall be the entire cost to the
authority of such preparation and/or review. The costs shall include personal
services of authority employees computed at an hourly rate, fringe benefits
attributable to such personal services, overhead attributable to such personal
services plus any other costs attributable to impact statement preparation or
review. (b) The authority may also
charge a fee to an applicant for the costs of publishing or filing any notices
required by this Part and for costs incurred in the conducting of a public
hearing. The fee charged shall be the entire cost to the authority of such
publishing, filing or hearings. The costs shall include personal services of
authority employees computed at an hourly rate, fringe benefits attributable to
such personal services, printing costs, stenographic costs and all other costs
attributable to such publishing, filing or hearings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1157.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
